name: Set of 3 | 18th Jan, Sat | 4-6pm
description:
You've asked us many times to bring workshops where you can create a set of 3
paintings, and we are finallyyyy bringing it to you!  
If you're looking at filling up that one wall in your house with paintings but
don't know where to start, then this one is for you!  
Create a set of 3 paintings, with patterns that are minimal, yet fun!  
**If you don't like the reference picture, get one of your own and our artist
will help you out with that too!  
**  
> Step by step guidance by an artist  
> 12 by 16 inch set of 3 canvas'  
> Beginner friendly  
> Children are welcome for all workshops.  
> Includes a non alcoholic beverage & Pizza's to share
Location : Paint Bar, Sadashivnagar, Bangalore  
Find directions to our studio here ->

name: Toast & Tonic X Paint Bar | 19th Jan, Sun | 4-6pm
description:
Toast & Tonic X Paint Bar bring you a Sip n' Paint to remember!  
  
We've tied up with **Toast & Tonic **to bring you a special Paint Bar! Try
something new, while you sip on cocktails from Toast & Tonic.  
> Step by step guidance by an artist  
> 12 by 16 inch canvas  
> Beginner friendly  
> Children are welcome for all workshops  
> Includes an alcoholic beverage.
Location : Toast & Tonic, Ashok Nagar, Bangalore  
Find directions to Toast & Tonic here ->
